summary: THE SHIFT LEVER IS HARD TO SHIFT, AND IT IS OUT OF ALIGNMENT.  WHEN I PUT THE SHIFT LEVER IN THE DRIVE MODE, IT STOPS IN 2ND GEAR, BUT THE INDICATOR ON THE DASH WILL SAY "D".  RIGHT NOW IT'S FUNCTIONING, BUT IT CAN GO ANYTIME NOW.  I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHY THIS IS HAPPENING, AND HOW MUCH IT WILL COST TO FIX, AND BETTER YET WILL IT FALL UNDER MY SILVER WARRANTY PLAN.*AK
